name: Different (TudyPie)
description:
A simple game about a little human that has to avoid to be seen by other humans because he is out of ordinary and he is different from the others. Earn coins from playing and buy skins from the shop

Controls :

- WASD or arrows  = move 

- Shift = run

This game was made for The Completion Game Jam in 48 hours. Loved this jam and I hope you will like my little project. Thanks!

The game was made by Tudypie with additional help by Vlad.
